data.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.
data.description:
You are in the main prayer room.
This is a room that is large, a prominent place of the temple. Everywhere there are stone benches, and there is colored stained glass on the high walls, a large stone altar is at the head of the room, the walls are adorned with gold and silver ornaments, and the floor is rich with
There's an old prayer books, a prayer book, and some golden trim here.

You are carrying a bible and a cross, and wearing some muddy shoes and a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I will take the golden trim and sell it to collect money.
data.mid_motivation: I will then divide the money in groups so that I can identify the list of needy.
data.long_motivation: I will give the money to the needy so that they can fulfill their livelihood requirements.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the shelf where there is golden trim.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put golden trim on the robe pocket.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give the golden trim to vendor in exchange of coins.
